content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest, Mr. Li. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask what your budget is for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I see. Well, as a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains. Therefore, I am afraid I cannot offer the lowest price possible. I would be willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually agreeable rental price. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of x Euro.

TERMINATE.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I see. Well, if that is the case, I will need to look for other potential tenants. Thank you for your time, Mr. Li.
name: Heinrich Heine
